%N A009024 E.g.f. x * cos(log(1+x)).
%F A009024 n * A003703(n-1).
%F A009024 a(n+3) = -a(n+2)*(2*n+1)*(n+3)/(n+2) - a(n+1)*(1+n^2)*(n+3)/(n+1), a(0)=0, a(1)=1, a(2)=0. - Sergei N. Gladkovskii, Aug 17 2012
